title: In silico exploration of acetic acid driven multicomponent synthesis: design, characterization, and antioxidant evaluation of spiroacridines and spiroquinolines
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,1128-1141
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00024B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Subham G. Patel, Dipti B. Upadhyay, Nirajkumar V. Shah, Mehul P. Parmar, Paras J. Patel, Apoorva Malik, Rakesh K. Sharma, Hitendra M. Patel
A simple, rapid and efficient multicomponent synthesis of spiroacridines and spiroquinolines was carried out under the influence of acetic acid and their antioxidant properties, DFT, docking and in silico ADMET and drug-likeness properties were explored.
